dropout.effective: improving generalization from the training to the test set

found.from sentence: We found dropout (Srivastava et al., 2014) to be particularly effective at improving generalization from the training to the test set, and used 0.5 as the dropout probability.

used.from sentence: We used the Adam optimizer with the standard settings (Kingma and Ba, 2014) and a learning rate of 0.003

to determine.from sentence: To determine the best hyperparameters we performed a grid search over 150 settings based on validation-set accuracy.
